front.title: RTP Payload Format for 3GPP Timed Text

abstract.t: This document specifies an RTP payload format for the transmission of 3GPP (3rd Generation Partnership Project) timed text. 3GPP timed text is a time-lined decorated text media format with defined storage in a 3GP file. Timed Text can be synchronized with audio/video contents and used in application such as captioning, titling and multimedia presentations. In the following sections the problems of streaming timed text are addressed and a payload format for streaming 3GPP timed text over RTP is specified.
